post:
<a href="http://www.astoundinghost.com">Astounding Host</a> has been in business for just over a year, providing quality services to everyone. We started going into the VPS market this year. We have grown rapidly in the past few months and have currently got lots of happy clients.

Why choose us?
- Hosted in the state of the art PhoenixNAP datacentre
- 1GBit port speed
- Intel Xeon CPU's on all nodes
- Root access
- Free migration from your current provider
